Translations.Text: Vela obec rebelled commands its Lord Jeho posol. Consequently my held them strictly accountable requited them hrozny requital
They suffered consequences ich decisions; profound loss
GOD chystat them severe retribution. Therefore ona reverence GOD O ona possess inteligencia verit GOD sent NADOL ONA ODKAZ

Posol recites do ona GOD's revelations clearly do lead those verit zavodny righteousness darkness into lahky! Ktokolvek verit v GOD leads righteous zivot He admit him zahrada flowing streams they abide therein forever GOD will generously reward him
GOD created 7 universes same zvazok Z ZEM. commands flow them. This bol let ona zauzlit lenze GOD bol Omnipotent ze GOD bol fully aware z all things
